data.title: Welcome
data.meta_description: Admission free. Discover half a million years of art and archaeology, from Egyptian mummies to modern art, at the University of Oxford’s Ashmolean Museum.

This special curator-led talk introducing our Money Talks exhibition will unpick the overlapping strands of prestige,...

This special curator-led talk introducing our Money Talks exhibition will unpick the overlapping strands of prestige, gender, politics and religion behind the art and power of mone...

This special curator-led talk introducing our Money Talks exhibition will unpick the overlapping strands of prestige, gender, politics and religion behind the art and power of money.

Join esteemed art historian Jaś Elsner to explore the subject of his new book about the Buddhist stūpa at Amarāvatī,...

Join esteemed art historian Jaś Elsner to explore the subject of his new book about the Buddhist stūpa at Amarāvatī, one of ancient India's most extraordinary monuments, and discover fresh insights into...

Join esteemed art historian Jaś Elsner to explore the subject of his new book about the Buddhist stūpa at Amarāvatī, one of ancient India's most extraordinary monuments, and discover fresh insights into early Buddhist art.
